bags.name: Ultimate Sack 6000
bags.description: The Ultimate Sack 6000 bean bag chair is a great place to stretch out after a long day or to hang out with some friends to catch a movie. Our bean bag chairs are a great spot to watch a game for you sports fans out there.

bags.name: Cozy Sack 6-Feet
bags.description: The Cozy Sack foam chair is the most comfortable place to sit anywhere. They are filled with the softest virgin urethane foam available. The urethane foam will spring back to normal size after every use and not go flat like the traditional bean bag chairs.

bags.name: Jumbo Shrimp Sack
bags.description: This plush bag is stuffed with shrimp, making this bag especially desirable to those who enjoy long walks on the beach.

bags.name: Gigantor Fur
bags.description: Regular Suede and Cord covers not doing it for you?  Why not try out our Luxury Fur Line! Super soft to the touch, with this chair you will feel as though you are sitting on a cloud.  Designed as the perfect indoor chair, the Gigantor Fur is like taking the massive size and beauty of the Gigantor and putting it up to an 11.

bags.name: Gamer Mini
bags.description: Are you sick of playing video games in uncomfortable, rock hard furniture? If so, then Sumo Lounge is here to rescue and improve your gaming experience. We now carry video game chairs for the kids with two different kinds of fabric. The original Microsuede video game chairs come in many different colors and are easy to clean and are very soft. Corduroy video game chairs come in many colors, are stylish and very easy to clean.

bags.name: Sack-Suma
bags.description: This bean bag chair is even big enough for two, making it the ultimate loveseat! Stuffed with fluffy shredded polyurethane foam filling, this bean bag chair is crazy cozy and offers plenty of support in a variety of positions. This bean bag also features a moisture resistant inner-liner with childproof zipper, and a soft yet durable Microsuede cover that is both removable and machine-washable. Care Instructions for Microsuede Cover: machine wash with cold water and tumble dry on low heat. Fluff as needed.

bags.name: Jaxx Sack 5-feet
bags.description: The Jaxx 5 ft Giant Bean Bag Chair is the world's perfect bean bag! We've tried traditional bean bags but they never met our expectations: we were forever repositioning, adjusting and picking ourselves up off the floor. With our extra large 5 ft Bean Bag Chair you can recline in comfort and style in environmentally-friendly alternative furniture.

bags.name: Baked Potato Sack
bags.description: Lounge away the day in a giant spud. The Baked Potato Beanbag Chair comes complete with a pat of butter pillow and is large enough for an adult to take a starchy nap on. Main dish, appetizers, and drinks not included.

bags.name: Ultimate Sack for Dogs
bags.description: Not your typical throw away dog bed. Built for durability and to withstand lots of use. Every bed comes with an inner liner and removable, washable cover. When we say large, we mean large!
